about_the_game:
This application includes various pieces of art design and a musical selection of ten tracks from STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN. To start the application, please run the EXE file found in the following directory.

...Steam\steamapps\common\STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN

content_descriptors.notes: Please be aware that scenes containing depictions of violence that is not suitable for all ages are included during gameplay.

detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400 / Intel® Core™ i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30FPS (1280x720)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600 / Intel® Core™ i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 XT / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60FPS (1920x1080)

short_description: A set including the digital art book and mini soundtrack of STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
